Summary Note:
The RM has known Martini Malatesta Bianchi since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Martini Malatesta Bianchi is a 50 year old Private Equity Investor from Italy.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Martini Malatesta Bianchi is currently divorced. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Martini earned his secondary school diploma from Istituto Tecnico Agrario Statale Francesco De Sanctis Foggia in 1993.
In 1998, Martini graduated from University of Rome La Sapienza with a degree.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 26 years, Martini Malatesta Bianchi brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Martini Malatesta Bianchi began his professional journey as a Investment Banker at Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A. in 1999, laying the foundation for future success.
At UniCredit S.p.A., he held the position of Private Equity Investor from 2002 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 250000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns villa in Pisa, where he resides. It is worth 2010000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 300000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Hedge Fund Manager, in 2012, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Martini as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
